definition: variant of 唯利是圖|唯利是图[wei2 li4 shi4 tu2]
to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking

sentences.english: virtue flies from the heart of a mercenary man.
sentences.chinese: 惟利是圖者，胸中無美好的品德。

sentences.english: This grandma who got revenge on her money-grabbing family.
sentences.chinese: 這位奶奶用自己的方式報復她唯利是圖的家人。

sentences.english: All they knew was that this Lab was a purebred.
sentences.chinese: 他們只知道馬利是條純種拉布拉多犬。

sentences.english: Bob Marley is the most well known singer of reggae music .
sentences.chinese: 巴布馬利是最知名的雷鬼歌手。

sentences.english: It is can't avoided that there are money-oriented people around us.
sentences.chinese: 我們周圍不可避免的存在唯利是圖的人。

sentences.english: It is unavoidable that they will become moeny-oriented and sometimes are spiritually contaminated.
sentences.chinese: 不可避免的會養成唯利是圖的思想，精神受到污染。

sentences.english: Some people may first misunderstand me as a money-grabber.
sentences.chinese: 可能一些人誤認爲我是個唯利是圖的人。

sentences.english: The graffiti reads "Chile, you do everything for profit". (Reuters/Ivan Alvarado)
sentences.chinese: 牆上寫着“智利，你唯利是圖”。

sentences.english: Peter Bottomly is a local farmer.
B:Because the food manufactures are so obsessed with making money that they lose the business ethics.
sentences.chinese: 因爲食品生產者惟利是圖，喪失了商業道德。

sentences.english: Bright red and is again overcharged once.
sentences.chinese: 大紅的利是又多收了一次。

sentences.english: Burnley are a resilient side and they've shown that all season.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩利是很不錯的球隊，他們已經證明了這點。

sentences.english: A:Because the food manufactures are so obsessed with making money that they lose the business ethics.
sentences.chinese: 因爲食品生產者惟利是圖，喪失了商業道德。

sentences.english: It is unavoidable that they will become money-oriented and sometimes are spiritually contaminated .
sentences.chinese: 不可避免，唯利是圖，精神受到污染。

sentences.english: He's a real bloodsucker and will take every penny you've got.
sentences.chinese: 他是個唯利是圖的人，會設法從你身上拿走每一分錢。

definition: to evaluate the merit of sth
to close a country/to exclude foreign contact/closed country (Qing China, North Korea etc)
variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
time flies like an arrow (idiom); How time flies!
to do a favor to sb
to propitiate the god of the current year, Tai Sui 太歲|太岁[Tai4 sui4]
mass/involving everyone/united/lit. to assemble the multitude
